articles.description: The president of the Football Association of Wales has confirmed Rob Page will remain in his post as Wales boss.
articles.title: Rob Page to remain as Wales manager

articles.description: Do you agree with our pundits on who starts for England at Euro 2024? Have your say here.
articles.title: Who starts England's Euro opener - do you agree with our pundits?

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for Sunrisers Hyderabad v Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League on BBC Sport.
articles.title: Sunrisers Hyderabad v Mumbai Indians - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: We asked for your views on Scotland's 1-0 home defeat by Northern Ireland and the tenor of the responses was unsurprisingly negative.
articles.title: Has 'dire' Scotland loss dented fans' optimism?

articles.description: World number one and 24-time Grand Slam champion Novak Djokovic says he and coach Goran Ivanisevic parted ways "a few days ago".
articles.title: Novak Djokovic splits with coach Goran Ivanisevic

articles.description: Northern Ireland captain Paddy McNair says the players have newfound belief but will stay grounded after Tuesday's impressive 1-0 win away to Scotland.
articles.title: 'Belief is back but NI will stay level-headed'

articles.description: Crystal Palace goalkeeper Sam Johnstone has been ruled out for the rest of the season and is set to miss Euro 2024 following elbow surgery.
articles.title: Johnstone set to miss Euros after elbow surgery

articles.description: England seal a series victory over New Zealand with a comprehensive 47-run win in the fourth T20 in Wellington.
articles.title: Bouchier leads England to T20 series win over NZ

articles.description: Nottingham Forest coach Steven Reid is fined and banned for aiming expletives at referee Paul Tierney in their game against Liverpool.
articles.title: Reid fined for expletive-laden abuse of referee

articles.description: Victoria Azarenka will face Kazakhstan's Elena Rybakina in the semi-finals as the Belarusian bids for a fourth title at the Miami Open.
articles.title: Miami Open: Three-time champion Victoria Azarenka sets up semi-final with Elena Rybakina
